1126209729225789447.text:
A reorg to recover exchange losses is like a bail-out for a bank mismanaging risk. 

Fortunately, it's so hard to pull off and so likely to fail that unlike banks, there won't be a bailout here. 

Those who fail security get to eat the cost. 

#NotYourKeysNotYourCoins

1125565625349197824.text:
Quick and (very) dirty formula for calculating monthly Eth2.0 validator rewards:

((e * i)/12 * p)/p

e = staked ETH amount
i = issuance rate/year
12 = months
p = price of ETH

Example:

((32 * 0.05)/12*180)/180 = 0.13 ETH per month

Remove the trailing p to get the $ amount.
